pages.text: An effect is a helpful or harmful condition that affects an entity. $(br2)Effects can be inflicted in various ways throughout the game, including consuming $(thing)Potions$() and some food items, being in the range of $(item)Beacons$() and $(item)Conduits$(), and being attacked by or close to certain mobs.
When drinking from $(item)Milk Bucket$(), dying, being saved from death by a $(item)Totem of Undying$(), or traveling through the return portal in $(thing)The End$(), all status effects are removed.

pages.title: Speed
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Increases walking speed; higher levels make the affected entity faster.

pages.title: Slowness
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Decreases walking speed; higher levels make the affected entity slower.

pages.title: Haste
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Increases mining and attack speed, higher levels increase the mining and attack speed.

pages.title: Mining Fatigue
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Decreases mining and attack speed, higher levels decrease the mining and attack speed.

pages.title: Strength
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Increases melee damage, higher levels make the affected entity do more melee damage.

pages.title: Instant Health
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive, Negative for Undead $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Heals living entities, damages undead, higher levels heal more health and do more damage.

pages.title: Instant Damage
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative, Positive for Undead $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Damages living entities, heals undead, higher levels do more damage and heal more health.

pages.title: Jump Boost
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Increases jump height and reduces fall damage, higher levels make the affected entity jump higher and reduces more fall damage.

pages.title: Nausea
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Wobbles and warps the screen.

pages.title: Regeneration
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Regenerates health over time, higher levels make health regenerate quicker.

pages.title: Resistance
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Reduces damage, higher levels reduce more damage.

pages.title: Fire Resistance
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Prevents the affected entity from taking damage due to $(item)Fire$(), $(item)Lava$() and other sources of fire damage.

pages.title: Water Breathing
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Prevents drowning and lets the affected entity breathe underwater.

pages.title: Invisibility
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Grants invisibility (but not the item they hold or the armor they wear), and reduces other mobs' detection range for the affected entity, higher levels reduce other mobs' detection range more.

pages.title: Blindness
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Impairs vision and disables the ability to sprint and critical hit.

pages.title: Night Vision
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Lets the player see well in darkness and underwater.

pages.title: Hunger
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Increases food exhaustion, higher levels cause the $(thing)Player$() to starve quicker.

pages.title: Weakness
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Decreases melee damage, higher levels decrease more melee damage.

pages.title: Poison
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Inflicts damage over time (but can't kill), higher levels do more damage per second, doesn't affect undead.

pages.title: Wither
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Inflicts damage over time (can kill), higher levels do more damage per second.

pages.title: Health Boost
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive  $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Increases maximum health, higher levels give the affected entity more maximum health.

pages.title: Absorption
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive   $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Adds damage absorption (additional hearts that can't be regenerated), higher levels give more absorption.

pages.title: Saturation
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive   $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Restores hunger and saturation.

pages.title: Glowing
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Neutral   $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Outlines the affected entity (can be seen through blocks).

pages.title: Levitation
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Neutral  $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Floats the affected entity upward.

pages.title: Luck
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive   $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Can increase chances of high-quality and more loot, higher levels increase the chances of better loot.

pages.title: Bad Luck
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative   $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Can reduce chances of high-quality and more loot, higher levels reduce the chance of good loot.

pages.title: Slow Falling
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive   $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Decreases falling speed and negates fall damage.

pages.title: Conduit Power
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive   $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Increases underwater visibility and mining speed, prevents drowning.

pages.title: Dolphin's Grace
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive   $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Increases swimming speed.

pages.title: Bad Omen
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Neutral  $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Causes an $(thing)Illager$() raid to start upon entering a village, higher levels cause a more difficult raid.

pages.title: Hero of the Village
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive  $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Gives discounts on trades with $(thing)Villagers$(), and makes them throw items at the $(thing)Player$() depending on their profession.

pages.title: Darkness
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative  $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Darkens the screen.
